alert.note: Alert for Northeast Prince William Sound (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 28 at 5:03AM AKST until March 01 at 7:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 PM AKST WEDNESDAY FOR THOMPSON PASS... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. Visibility reduced to one half mile. * WHERE...Northeast Prince William Sound. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 7 PM AKST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will develop this evening along with increasing winds. Winds will initially be southeasterly, but are expected to become northeasterly and increase through the early morning hours Wednesday. Snow and gusty winds will continue through Wednesday evening before tapering off. A second round of gusty winds, along with blowing and drifting snow, is possible Thursday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
